classes.description: A collection of all character classes in the game, defining their properties, champions, and visual elements.

card_draft_icon.description: Reference to the clans card draft sprite used in the Victory UI. Image sized 71x84.

card_style.description: The visual style applied to cards of this class.

champions.description: List of champion variants available for this class.

id.description: Unique identifier for this champion variant.

card_data.description: Reference to the champion's card data.

starter_card.description: Reference to the champion's starter card.

upgrade_tree.description: Tree of possible upgrades for this champion.

items.description: Reference to an upgrade's unique identifier. These upgrades should have property 'titles' set for the name of the upgrade.

icon.description: Reference to the champion's icon sprite.

locked_icon.description: Reference to the champion's locked state icon sprite.

portrait.description: Reference to the champion's portrait sprite.

selected_sfx_cue.description: Reference to the sound cue played when this champion is selected.

clan_select_sfx_cue.description: (Unused by the base game) Reference to the sound effect cue played for this class. To use a custom sound effect, a sound effect must be registered globally.

class_select_character_displays.description: References to Character Art GameObjects to display on the RunSetupScreen. This should be a scaled up version of each Champion in the clan. (Currently doesn't support modification of existing champions in the RunSetupScreen.)'

class_unlock_preview_texts.description: List of preview texts shown for this class if locked.

corruption_enabled.description: Enables Wurmkin's charged echoes mechanic. Allowing stacking charged echoes on floors

icons.description: Set of icons used to represent this class in different contexts.

small.description: Reference to the small icon sprite. This is sized 48x48.

medium.description: Reference to the medium icon sprite. This is used in artifact page in the logbook. Despite being named medium it is sized 128x128.

large.description: Reference to the large icon sprite. This is sized 92x92.

silhouette.description: Reference to the silhouette icon sprite. This is an all white image sized 72x72.

is_crew.description: Whether this class is a crew member class.

is_launch_clan.description: Whether this class is a clan available at original game launch.

is_wurmkin.description: Whether this class is Wurmkin (and it is not).

override.description: Whether this class overrides an existing class with the same ID (requires the Unity Asset Name).

random_draft_enhancer_pool.description: Reference to an EnhancerPool used to randomly apply enhancers to card drafts.

starter_card_upgrade.description: Reference to the upgrade applied to starter cards.

starter_relics.description: List of relics that start with this class.

subclass_descriptions.description: Localized text describing the subclass system.

titles.description: Localized text for this class's title.

ui_color.description: Primary color used in the UI for this class.

ui_color_dark.description: Dark variant of the UI color for this class.

ui_gradient.description: Color gradient used in the UI for this class, specifically used in the Clan Select Dialog as the background when clan is selected.

color.description: Color at this time point in the gradient.

unlock_data.description: Data defining how this class is unlocked. (Not implemented)

descriptions.description: Localized text describing the unlock requirements.

tracked_value.description: Value that needs to be tracked for unlocking.

param_int.description: Numerical parameter for the unlock requirement.

items.description: A class definition that specifies all properties and behaviors of a character class in the game.
